sentences: Meie pääseme oma elu, elagu nemad oma!
Kuidas ta oma elu elatud saab? Pääseme veel paremini.
context: The word 'pääseme' is the 1st person plural present indicative form of the Estonian verb 'pääsma', which means 'to get', 'to reach', or 'to be able to'. In this context, it appears in phrases related to living or experiencing life similarly to others. It suggests reaching a state where one can live in a certain way or achieve a particular lifestyle.
